name: UTypedElementSelectionSet
doc:
A wrapper around an element list that ensures mutation goes via the selection
interfaces, as well as providing some utilities for batching operations.

OnPreSelectionChange: Delegate that is invoked whenever the underlying element list is potentially about to change.
OnSelectionChange: Delegate that is invoked whenever the underlying element list has been changed.

methods.name: AllowSelectionModifiers
methods.doc: Test to see whether selection modifiers (Ctrl or Shift) are allowed while selecting this element.

methods.name: CanDeselectElement
methods.doc: Test to see whether the given element can be deselected.

methods.name: CanSelectElement
methods.doc: Test to see whether the given element can be selected.

methods.name: ClearSelection
methods.doc:
Clear the current selection.
@return True if the selection was changed, false otherwise.

methods.name: CountSelectedElements
methods.doc: Count the number of selected elements, optionally filtering to elements that implement the given interface.

methods.name: CountSelectedObjects
methods.doc: Count the number of selected objects.

methods.name: DeselectElement
methods.doc:
Attempt to deselect the given element.
@return True if the selection was changed, false otherwise.

methods.name: DeselectElements
methods.doc:
Attempt to deselect the given elements.
@return True if the selection was changed, false otherwise.

methods.name: GetBottomSelectedObject
methods.doc: Get the last selected object of the given type.

methods.name: GetCurrentSelectionState
GetNumSelectedElements
methods.doc: Get the number of selected elements.

methods.name: GetSelectedObjects
methods.doc: Get the array of selected objects from the currently selected elements.

methods.name: GetSelectionElement
methods.doc: Given an element, return the element that should actually perform a selection operation.

methods.name: GetTopSelectedObject
methods.doc: Get the first selected object of the given type.

methods.name: HasSelectedElements
methods.doc: Test whether there selected elements, optionally filtering to elements that implement the given interface.

methods.name: HasSelectedObjects
methods.doc: Test whether there are any selected objects.

methods.name: IsElementSelected
methods.doc: Test to see whether the given element is currently considered selected.

methods.name: GetSelectedElementHandles
methods.doc: Get the handle of every selected element, optionally filtering to elements that implement the given interface.

methods.name: RestoreSelectionState
methods.doc:
Restores the selection set from the given state.
The calling code is responsible for managing any undo state.

methods.name: SelectElement
methods.doc:
Attempt to select the given element.
@return True if the selection was changed, false otherwise.

methods.name: SelectElements
methods.doc:
Attempt to select the given elements.
@return True if the selection was changed, false otherwise.

methods.name: SetSelection
